name: Bond (jacquealvesb)
description: During our lives we have a lot of relationships, friends, family, boyfriends, girlfriends, partners... this game is my interpretation of some of them. How things can be easier if we have someone with us, how we have to cultivate these bonds to keep them, how some of them end in an unexpected way that we have no control over, and how we have to know the balance between our well-being and the well-being of others, we need to be good about ourselves to make others feel good :)
